item.description:
Hosting my first Meet-up with this group. I have cross-posted this with another group, so we should get a decent group together. Wood-n-Tap has a great Happy Hour until 7pm and a nice little patio outside. They even allow you to get the Happy Hour specials outdoors. There is some parking across the street, but also on the street. If you're not arriving til later, no worries, just let us know.

I look forward to seeing you all!

http://www.woodntap.com/menus/happy-tappy-hour/
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me if you can't find us 716-307-6590

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: A Laid Back (and hopefully outdoor) Happy Hour at Wood-n-Tap Thurs July 12
